comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: ironically, this appears to be a German design 77 mm field gun. The barrel design and the part under the barrel are distinctive. As a neutral country, one must imagine Belgium could purchase arms from any willing seller. here is an example: www.flickr.com/photos/9028007@N05/3732286252/

comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: Germany probably regarded selling guns to Belgium as just another means of forward deployment...
